data.name: Minami Kamakura High School Girls Cycling Club: Entrance Ceremony!
data.short_description: Having just moved from Nagasaki to Kamakura, Maiharu Hiromi leaves her house on a bike to attend the Minami Kamakura High School entrance ceremony, but she realizes that she's forgotten how to ride a bike for some reason.
